scripts.prod-build: cd ./ClientApp && ng build -e prod && cd ../public/client-app && rm -rf index.html && mv favicos ../
scripts.db: npm run dev-build && npm run serve
scripts.prod: cd ./ClientApp && npm install && ng build -e prod
scripts.install-all: cp env.example env && npm install && cd ./bootstrap && mkdir cache && cd ../ && composer update && cd ./ClientApp && npm install && npm install -g @angular/cli && php artisan key:generate
